attributes.action: For goverment to remove the Knighthood awarded to Sir Norman Bettison,
attributes.background: He was awarded the knighthood for services to the police force, they did not know the full facts of the Hillsbrough diaster or his part in the false reports that the liverpool fans where to blame

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
